brand_info.name: Salomon
brand_info.positioning: Mountain sports brand focused on trail running, hiking, winter sports, and outdoor performance, combining technical innovation with a deep connection to nature and terrain.
brand_info.vision: To unleash the best in people through mountain sports.
brand_info.mission: To create innovative gear that enables people to play, progress, and connect with nature through mountain sports.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1947 in Annecy, in the French Alps, by François Salomon as a ski-edge workshop, later evolving into a global brand specializing in mountain sports equipment, footwear, and apparel.

brand_values.brand_promise: Technically advanced gear designed to perform in real mountain conditions and enable confidence, speed, and freedom across terrain.
differentiators: Deep-rooted Alpine heritage and mountain credibility
Strong leadership in trail running and mountain sports
Design driven by real-world terrain testing and athlete feedback
non_negotiables: Gear must function in demanding outdoor conditions

psychographics.lifestyle: People who seek outdoor challenges, value self-reliance, and pursue performance and exploration in natural environments
psychographics.behavior: Chooses equipment based on terrain and conditions, follows trail and outdoor athletes, invests in trusted gear franchises, values durability and performance

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Terrain-driven and experience-led with confident, concise language rooted in exploration and performance
tone_dos: Highlight freedom of movement and progression

logo.primary_logo: Salomon wordmark with signature mountain-inspired logotype
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clarity and contrast; never distort; ensure legibility over complex outdoor backgrounds
logo.lockup_behavior: Typically used as an end-card or subtle corner mark; restrained and confident placement
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the Salomon wordmark

color_system.color_usage_rules: Neutral base supporting natural environments; terrain-inspired accents used to complement outdoor scenes

typography.primary_font: Modern sans-serif with technical, outdoor character

layout_principles.grid_system: Flexible grid adapting to landscape imagery
layout_principles.alignment: Clean alignment that respects natural composition of landscapes

preferred_photographers: Varies by discipline; consistent mountain and trail-focused visual language
style.camera_feel: Immersive outdoor realism emphasizing scale, terrain, and movement
style.pose_guidelines: Athletes in motion across trails, slopes, and ridgelines; purposeful movement; balance and flow
style.casting_attitude: Outdoor athletes and explorers; confident, focused, connected to environment

technical.lighting: Natural daylight; golden hour and overcast conditions favored
technical.grain: Low to moderate depending on environment
technical.depth_of_field: Medium to deep to preserve landscape context
technical.color_grading: Natural, slightly muted tones reflecting real outdoor conditions

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Footwear traction, stability systems, and apparel protection must be readable in motion

motion_rules.transitions: Natural cuts; occasional slow-motion to emphasize terrain interaction

visual_dos: Show athletes interacting with real terrain
visual_donts: Artificial studio look for mountain gear

must_remain: Connection between athlete, product, and terrain

digital.tone_adjustment: More educational and terrain-specific online; inspirational outdoor storytelling on social

platform_behavior.Instagram: Trail motion, mountain landscapes, athlete journeys
platform_behavior.Website: Terrain- and use-case-driven product pages with technical explanations
platform_behavior.Newsletter: New gear drops, trail stories, athlete insights

print.cover_rules: Landscape-led visuals with minimal copy and clear Salomon mark
